rows.label: tev001494_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0002
rows.name:
My Skell took a pretty serious beating during my last
Interceptor mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0003
rows.name:
And now I gotta sit here and pretend to listen while
this mechanic lectures me about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0004
rows.name:
That's the way we fight, though. We don't plan
for things to go off the rails like thatâ€”they just do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_JNK0010
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: tev001494_SEL0011
rows.name:
Suggest that Irina's aggressiveness may
be working against her sometimes.

rows.label: tev001494_JNK0020
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev001494_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Irina that there is nothing
wrong with the way she fights.

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0005
rows.name:
When you need to protect someone or acquire
something important, there isn't always time for finesse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm just doing what needs to be done to complete
the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'd never forgive myself if someone got hurt because
I was sitting back and calculating the most efficient
way to kill a dangerous enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0008
rows.name:
I can't imagine you've come this far without being in
the same situation yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0009
rows.name: I appreciate that, but I'm fine. Really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0010
rows.name:
Outside of the colonel chewing me out personally,
nothing will get me to change my tactics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0011
rows.name:
If experience has taught me anything, it's that it's better
to go too far than risk not going far enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0012
rows.name:
I can't imagine you've come this far without being in
the same situation yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001494_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you have had cause to regret past inaction.

rows.label: tev001494_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev001494_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Irina that you live a life free of regret.

rows.label: tev001494_JNK0050
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: tev001494_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that rash action can just as easily lead to regret.

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0013
rows.name: I imagine everyone's had that experience at least once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0014
rows.name: I'm no exception, even though it was a long time ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0015
rows.name:
That's when I decided I never wanted to feel that
way again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0016
rows.name:
Sure, I have moments of indecision, but that's when I
just summon my courage and take action![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0017
rows.name:
Even when it looks hopeless, I remind myself that I'm
doing it for the team, and my courage never wavers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0018
rows.name: No one will ever die again because I faltered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ah, well. I suppose we should cut this short, huh?
I'm supposed to be getting chewed out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm looking forward to our next mission together.
I need your support for my reckless ways! Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0021
rows.name: It must be nice to lead a life of such utter confidence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0022
rows.name: I don't think I could ever be so shameless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0023
rows.name:
But there's no denying that you've accomplished great
things as a BLADE, and even earned the respect of
the colonel herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0024
rows.name:
The next time we go on a mission together,
I want to watch this philosophy of yours in action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0025
rows.name:
Maybe emulating your methods will allow me to
complete my missions without causing worry for
everyone around this joint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0026
rows.name: I look forward to your lesson, professor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0027
rows.name: That's fair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0028
rows.name:
Actions taken with the best intentions sometimes have
unexpected consequences.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0029
rows.name:
But no one can predict what action will lead to which
consequence. You just have to accept that it won't
always work out like you hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0030
rows.name:
If you ask me, all that really matters is whether you
made the best choice possible for yourself and the
people you care about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0031
rows.name:
Maybe you'll still regret the outcome, but if you know
you gave it everything you had, it softens the blow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0032
rows.name: That's the way I live my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0033
rows.name:
So yeah, when it comes to protecting my friends,
maybe I do go a little over the top sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001494_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'll understand if you feel differently, but I have things
in my life that I don't intend to lose.[ST:wait ]
